CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 清晰的；明确的；清楚的；明显的；容易看见的；透明的；清澈的；明亮的；易懂的；清晰可辨的；头脑清醒的；无障碍的；空旷的；无遮挡的；无罪的；纯的；纯净的；不含混的；无云的；无雾的；晴空万里的；发音清晰的；清脆的；完全的；彻底的；整个的；全部的；足额的；满额的；悬空的；悬离的；未触及的；不接触的
远离地；不靠近；无障碍地
清除；清理；清空；澄清；解除；排除；清晰地表达；使明确；通过；越过；批准；获得批准；结算；结账；清算；清偿；还清债务；结算货币；兑现支票；净赚；净得；获利；（足球中）解围；证明…无罪；证明…无辜；使变得明朗；使变得清澈；清扫；（飞机）获得起飞（或降落）许可；船（只）离港；烟雾消散；天气放晴；使变清晰；使变清醒；（货物）通过海关检查；批准离境（或入境）

synonym.mean: 清楚的；清澈的；晴朗的；无罪的

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 清晰地；明显地；无疑地；明净地

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指视力不受阻碍，强调清晰透澈。
指某物完全透明状态，通过它能清楚看到其它东西。
指用硬刷、肥皂或水用力地擦洗某物。
是这些动词中最常用的词，指将某物或某处的污物等清除掉，弄干净。
指将积落在物体表面的尘土抹去、掸掉或擦去以保干净。
多指用布、纸等物把东西擦净，也指擦掉某物。
侧重指用拖把擦洗地板，有时也指擦干净或擦去。
指用扫帚等进行清扫，也用作比喻。
普通用词，侧重清楚明白。
语气较强，指极为明显，有目共睹，无需说明和论证。
指根据事实成为显然的。
强调显而易见或一想便知。这个词从动词appear派生而来，故有时含有表面如此而事实上未必的意味。
语义较强，书面用词，强调一目了然，暗示不要任何推论就一清二楚。
语气肯定，着重明白无误，无可怀疑。
普通用词，含义与clear很接近，可通用，但plain着重简单明了，不复杂。
较正式用词，指轮廓的清楚或定义、含义的明确，不会弄错。

word_group.brief_definition: 脱离危险, 脱离嫌疑
(通过倾诉)改变困境, 缓解紧张状态, 改善气氛；说清事实, 消除嫌隙；净化空气
清澈透明的, 晶莹的；浅显易懂的, 显而易见的
用普通文字；不使用密码

bilingual.target: 我们需要一个清楚的计划。

bilingual.source: Only a blockhead would ignore such clear instructions.
bilingual.target: 只有笨蛋才会忽视这么清楚的指示。

bilingual.source: Mr. White gave me very clear directions.
bilingual.target: 怀特先生给了我非常清楚的指示。
此刻很清楚的只需要从头启动。
这是一个基本和清楚的事实。
没有比这更清楚的课程了。

bilingual.source: There is a clear piece of this.

list.abstract: Clear是计算机中一种元素，clear属性定义了元素的哪一侧不允许其他浮动元素，在CSS1和CSS2中，是通过自动为清除元素增加上外边距实现的。
英文词汇，意为清楚的，干净的；有多种含义。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I think it would send a very clear message to ICO. In the short term, yes, but…
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想这会给哈里发国发出非常清楚的信号。短期来看没错，但是...

yingyinNormal.en: In doing so, he tries to follow a simple structure, with a clear beginning, middle, and end that links together his various points and builds to his conclusion.
yingyinNormal.zh: 操作下来，他试图遵循一个简单的架构，有清楚的开场白，中间精彩部分，以及结尾要乎相呼应到他所提及的要点与结论。

yingyinNormal.en: OK, so let's clear up a bit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，现在稍稍清洁一下。

yingyinNormal.en: Do I make myself clear? Yes, sir.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我说清楚了吗？清楚了，先生。

yingyinNormal.en: Let me make this perfectly clear, Bill.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让我非常直白地说吧，比尔

yingyinNormal.en: But you're clear-headed now, right? Yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是你现在清醒了，对吧？是的。

yingyinNormal.en: You clear on the shampoo issue? Get out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那洗发精的事情你明白了吗？快滚。

yingyinNormal.en: "Thou shalt not kill" seems pretty clear.
yingyinNormal.zh: "不可杀人"说的倒是很明确。

yingyinNormal.en: LeAnn told me she was very clear with you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 莉安告诉我她已经跟你说得很明白了。

yingyinNormal.en: Which is a clear violation of our rules here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 明显是违反了我们这儿的规矩。

yingyinNormal.en: The line is clear. But not guaranteed, Jingim.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谁继任汗位显而易见。但是无法保证，真金。

yingyinNormal.en: That's what I was doing. Oh, that wasn't clear.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我刚才就是在说这个啊。你说得不够清楚。

yingyinNormal.en: Which is clear evidence of your insanity. Yeah. Ok.
yingyinNormal.zh: 显然能证明你是疯了。好吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Thank you. I'll take it from here. Clear the floor.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢谢，这里交给我吧，将楼层人员清空。

yingyinNormal.en: Think she could clear away some of his sardine cans.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她本可以清理走一些他的沙丁鱼罐头的。

yingyinNormal.en: Let me just check my work schedule. Yeah. All clear.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让我看看日程安排，无所事事。

yingyinNormal.en: Samantha. I was speaking perfectly clear English, Mother.
yingyinNormal.zh: 萨曼塔。我说的可是标准清晰的英语，妈妈。

yingyinNormal.en: Knock door-to-door, if necessary. Clear these bastards out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 必要的话，挨家挨户的查，把这些混蛋都揪出来。

yingyinNormal.en: What was? It was made perfectly clear an advantageous marriage...
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么？这门婚事明显是为了谋取利益的……

yingyinNormal.en: Their very existence is a threat. Is that clear, Commander? Clear, sir. Good. Carry on, Colonel.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们的存在就是个威胁，明白吗，指挥官？明白，很好，请继续，上校。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 清晰地；明白地；明显地；无疑地
adj. 不清楚的；不明确的；不明朗的；含糊的；不明显的；怀疑的；茫然的

word_family.mean: adj. 清晰的；清楚的；明白的；干净的；畅通的；无阻的；未碰触的；悬离的；全的；整的；满的；足的；发音清晰的

sense_info_list.en: obvious and leaving no doubt at all; having or feeling no doubt or confusion

examination_example.sentence: Get <highlight>clear</highlight> on what impact you're hoping to have.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 弄清楚你希望产生什么样的影响。

examination_example.sentence: It is not yet <highlight>clear</highlight> how advertisers will respond.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 目前还不清楚广告商将如何回应。

examination_example.sentence: As the cost to everyone else has become <highlight>clearer</highlight>, politicians have begun to clamp down.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着其他人付出的代价变得越来越明显，政客们已经开始打压。

examination_example.sentence: There, as people got more money, some of them may have more <highlight>cleared</highlight> land for cattle to raise for meat, Ferraro says.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Ferraro说，在那里，随着人们挣更多的钱，他们中的一些人可能会有更多的空地来养牛吃肉。

examination_example.sentence: Typically, if rains are delayed, people may <highlight>clear</highlight> land to plant more rice to supplement their harvests.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通常，如果降雨推迟，人们可能会清理土地种植更多的水稻来补充收成。

examination_example.sentence: The state's proposed Forest Carbon Plan aims to double efforts to thin out young trees and <highlight>clear</highlight> brush in parts of the forest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该州提出的森林碳计划旨在加倍努力，减少小树，清除森林部分地区的灌木丛。

examination_example.sentence: To win over these young workers, manufacturers have to <highlight>clear</highlight> another major hurdle: parents, who lived through the worst US economic downturn.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 要赢得这些年轻的工人，企业主必须清除另一个障碍：家长。他们经历了美国最严重的一次经济下行。

sense_info_list.en: easy to understand, see, or hear

examination_example.sentence: It needs to create <highlight>clear</highlight> rules protecting openness and innovation online.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它需要制定明确的规则来保护在线开放和创新。

examination_example.sentence: Become increasingly <highlight>clear</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 变得越来越清晰。

examination_example.sentence: Even if you accept Friedman's premise and regard corporate social responsibility policies as a waste of shareholders'money, things may not be absolutely <highlight>clear</highlight>-cut.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使你接受弗里德曼的前提，认为公司的社会责任政策是浪费股东的钱，事情也可能不是绝对明确的。

examination_example.sentence: Division of labor at home is seldom <highlight>clear</highlight>-cut.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在家的分工很少是明确的。

sense_info_list.en: approve or be approved by

examination_example.sentence: If it <highlight>clears</highlight> the House, this measure would still have to get through the Senate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果众议院批准，这项措施也仍需参议院批准。

sense_info_list.en: able to think sensibly and reasonably

examination_example.sentence: According to the career counselors and experts who study them, Generation Zs are <highlight>clear</highlight>-eyed, economic pragmatists.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据职业顾问和研究他们的专家说，z世代是目光敏锐的经济实用主义者。

sense_info_list.en: free from feelings of guilt
go over or by without touching
free from blame
make as profit
all the way
free of anything that marks or darkens something
disappear so that it is easier to see things
not touching, or away from

word_usage.usage: clear作形容词时，可以表示“全部的；整体的；完整的”，只能放在名词前，修饰该名词，如：three clear days。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 干净的; 打扫; 清扫

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 清晰地；明白地；明显地；无疑地
adj. 不清楚的；不明确的；不明朗的；含糊的；不明显的；怀疑的；茫然的
n. 清除；许可；批准；移动空间；拆迁；清空；接触机密的官方许可；偿清；解围球

word_family.mean: adj. 清晰的；清楚的；明白的；干净的；畅通的；无阻的；未碰触的；悬离的；全的；整的；满的；足的；发音清晰的

sense_info_list.en: easily heard, seen, noticed, or understood

examination_example.sentence: The researchers discovered that when the team is passionate about the third phase—developing a firm—there's a <highlight>clear</highlight> link to performance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员发现，当团队对第三阶段——发展公司——充满热情时，这与绩效有着明显的联系。

examination_example.sentence: And for the first time in my life, I have a <highlight>clear</highlight>-eyed view of myself that is authentic, compassionate and accepting.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我人生中第一次对自己有了一个清晰的认识，那就是真实、富有同情心和乐于接受。

examination_example.sentence: But as the regressive (倒退的) nature of Mussolini's regime became <highlight>clear</highlight>, he began to suffer a crisis of conscience.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但随着墨索里尼政权的倒退的本质变得清晰，他开始遭遇道德危机。

examination_example.sentence: Nicola Sturgeon's speech last Tuesday setting out the Scottish government's legislative programme for the year ahead confirmed what was already pretty <highlight>clear</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Nicola Sturgeon上周二发表的讲话，阐述了苏格兰政府未来一年的立法计划，证实了已经相当明确的事情。

examination_example.sentence: It became <highlight>clear</highlight> that the real-world socialite component correlated with greater wellbeing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很明显，现实世界中的社交名流与更大的幸福感相关。

examination_example.sentence: One thing remains <highlight>clear</highlight>; The future of energy is in how we store it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有一件事是可以肯定的: 能源的未来在于我们如何储存能源。

sense_info_list.en: all the way
easily seen through
sense_info_list.zh: 干净的; 打扫; 清扫

word_usage.usage: clear的比较级为clearer，最高级为clearest。但当clear作“完全的，十足的”时，无比较级和最高级。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 强调显而易见或一想便知。这个词从动词 appear 派生而来, 故有时含有表面如此而事实上未必的意味。
普通用词, 侧重清楚明白。
语气肯定, 着重明白无误, 无可怀疑。
较正式用词, 指轮廓的清楚或定义、含义的明确, 不会弄错。
指根据事实成为显然的。
语义较强, 书面用词, 强调一目了然, 暗示不要任何推论就一清二楚。
语气较强, 指极为明显, 有目共睹, 无需说明和论证。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 干净的; 打扫; 清扫

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 清晰地；明白地；明显地；无疑地
adj. 不清楚的；不明确的；不明朗的；含糊的；不明显的；怀疑的；茫然的

word_family.mean: adj. 清晰的；清楚的；明白的；干净的；畅通的；无阻的；未碰触的；悬离的；全的；整的；满的；足的；发音清晰的

sense_info_list.en: easily heard; seen; noticed; or understood

examination_example.sentence: It is one thing to use AI within a game with <highlight>clear</highlight> rules and <highlight>clear</highlight> goals. It is something very different to use AI in the real world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在规则明确、目标清晰的棋局中使用人工智能是一回事。在现实世界中使用人工智能是完全不同的事情。

examination_example.sentence: Nonetheless, physicians say that they look at the collective data and a <highlight>clear</highlight> picture emerges.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管如此，医生们表示，他们从集体数据来看，一个清晰的画面出现了。

examination_example.sentence: PepsiCo claims a packet of its chips now contains less salt than a slice of white bread. However, its new 10-year plan makes <highlight>clear</highlight> it believes it still has a long way to go.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 百事公司声称其一包薯片的含盐量现在比一片白面包还要少。但是，其新的10年计划明确表示，它相信自己还有很长的路要走。

examination_example.sentence: Especially for women, there is a <highlight>clear</highlight> penalty at work for being overweight or obese.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尤其是对女性来说，超重或肥胖在工作中会明显处于劣势。

examination_example.sentence: The link between sleep and health, and bad sleep and disease is becoming <highlight>clearer</highlight> and <highlight>clearer</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 睡眠与健康以及不良睡眠与疾病之间的联系越来越明显。

examination_example.sentence: When you look at attitudes toward driverless cars, there doesn't seem to be a <highlight>clear</highlight> generational divide.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你观察人们对无人驾驶汽车的态度时，似乎没有明显的代沟。

sense_info_list.en: easily seen through
sense_info_list.zh: 干净的; 打扫; 清扫

examination_example.sentence: Well, we can't paint the walls without <highlight>clearing</highlight> all the furniture first.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 嗯，不把家具都清理干净，就不能粉刷墙壁。

examination_example.sentence: A Philippine fisherman was feeling down on his luck when a house fire forced him to <highlight>clear</highlight> out his possessions and change locations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一名菲律宾渔民因为房屋发生火灾不得不清理自己的财产并更改住址，他感觉自己的运气不佳。

examination_example.sentence: On the first Sunday of every month, Paris <highlight>clears</highlight> traffic from eight lanes of the main road.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每个月的第一个星期日，巴黎都会疏通主要道路的八条车道。

examination_example.sentence: These studies are impressive, but in reality, the benefits of boredom may be related to having time to <highlight>clear</highlight> your mind, be quiet, or daydream.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些研究令人印象深刻，但实际上，无聊的好处可能在于令人有时间理清思绪、保持平静或做白日梦。

sense_info_list.en: approve or be approved by

word_usage.usage: clear的比较级为clearer，最高级为clearest。但当clear作“完全的，十足的”时，无比较级和最高级。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 强调显而易见或一想便知。这个词从动词 appear 派生而来，故有时含有表面如此而事实上未必的意味。
普通用词，侧重清楚明白。
语气肯定，着重明白无误，无可怀疑。
较正式用词，指轮廓的清楚或定义、含义的明确，不会弄错。
指根据事实成为显然的。
语义较强，书面用词，强调一目了然，暗示不要任何推论就一清二楚。
语气较强，指极为明显，有目共睹，无需说明和论证。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 清除; 驱散; (天气)转晴
无云(或雾)的; 晴朗的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 清晰地；明白地；明显地；无疑地
adj. 不清楚的；不明确的；不明朗的；含糊的；不明显的；怀疑的；茫然的

word_family.mean: adj. 清晰的；清楚的；明白的；干净的；畅通的；无阻的；未碰触的；悬离的；全的；整的；满的；足的；发音清晰的

examination_example.sentence: Once you are <highlight>clear</highlight> about your reason, tell your family or roommates about the change you want to make.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一旦你清楚了自己的理由，就把你想做的改变告诉你的家人或室友。

examination_example.sentence: Take a look at it, and make sure you're <highlight>clear</highlight> about everything.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 看一看，确保你对一切都很清楚。

examination_example.sentence: I hope I've given you a <highlight>clear</highlight> idea of the schedule for your London weekend.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我希望我已经让你清楚地了解了你在伦敦周末的安排。

examination_example.sentence: At this point, it is not <highlight>clear</highlight> why dogs seem to be equipped with the ability to recognize different facial expressions in humans.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这一点上，目前还不明确为什么狗似乎具备了识别人类不同面部表情的能力。

examination_example.sentence: In his introduction, he made it <highlight>clear</highlight> that our credits would be hard-earned.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在他的介绍中，他明确表示，我们的功劳将是来之不易的。

examination_example.sentence: As writer Caroline Alexander makes <highlight>clear</highlight> in her forceful and well-researched story The Endurance, adventuring was even then a thoroughly commercial effort.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如作家Caroline Alexander在她有力的、经过充分研究的故事《耐力》中明确指出的那样，即使在当时，冒险也是一项彻底的商业努力。

sense_info_list.zh: 清除; 驱散; (天气)转晴

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>clear</highlight> the atmosphere.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们净化了大气。

sense_info_list.zh: 无云(或雾)的; 晴朗的

examination_example.sentence: The day was cold but <highlight>clear</highlight>; tourists and Londoners stopped to watch the skaters.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一天很冷，但天气晴朗；游客和伦敦人都停下来观看滑冰者。

examination_example.sentence: The only components required, though, are a 5'×5' sheet of <highlight>clear</highlight> or slightly milky plastic, six feet of plastic tube, and a container.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不过，唯一需要的组件是一张5'×5'的透明或略带乳白色的塑料片，六英尺的塑料管，以及一个容器。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 清澈的; 光洁的; 变透明
畅通无阻的; 打扫干净(的)
明显的; 明白无疑的
头脑清醒的; 思路清楚的
(clear up)解决; 解释; 解答

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 清晰地；明白地；明显地；无疑地
adj. 不清楚的；不明确的；不明朗的；含糊的；不明显的；怀疑的；茫然的

word_family.mean: adj. 清晰的；清楚的；明白的；干净的；畅通的；无阻的；未碰触的；悬离的；全的；整的；满的；足的；发音清晰的

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 解决(问题)；消除(误会)；揭开(谜团)；整理；收拾；(天气)放晴；变晴朗

sense_info_list.en: free of anything that marks or darkens something
sense_info_list.zh: 清澈的; 光洁的; 变透明

examination_example.sentence: I'll write something like, "I might not have <highlight>clear</highlight> skin, but I like my eyes."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我会写下这样的话：我可能没有光洁的皮肤，但我喜欢我的眼睛。

examination_example.sentence: Thanks to their hard work, the Yangtze River is getting <highlight>clearer</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于他们的努力，长江变得越来越清澈。

examination_example.sentence: Through the <highlight>clear</highlight> water, visitors can see the bright colors of the fishes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 透过清澈的水，游客们可以看到鱼儿鲜艳的颜色。

sense_info_list.en: easily heard, seen, noticed, or understood

examination_example.sentence: However, the road rules for drivers were not very <highlight>clear</highlight> and many people were hurt crossing the roads.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，司机对道路规则不是很清楚，许多人在过马路时受伤。

examination_example.sentence: By then, I realized I should have made mine shorter and <highlight>clearer</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到那时，我才意识到我应该把自己的（演讲）写得更简短清晰。

examination_example.sentence: Most teachers at that time thought this new letter grading system was an easy, fair and <highlight>clear</highlight> way to grade students.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当时大多数老师认为这种新的字母评分系统是给学生评分的一种简单、公平且清晰的方法。

sense_info_list.zh: 畅通无阻的; 打扫干净(的)

examination_example.sentence: Every day they were busy with cutting the grass and <highlight>clearing</highlight> the bushes（灌木）．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们每天都忙于割草和清理灌木丛。

examination_example.sentence: We have already <highlight>cleared</highlight> out a lot of things from our bedrooms.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们已经从卧室里清理出了很多东西。

examination_example.sentence: From time to time, my mother <highlight>clears</highlight> out the clothes which I no longer wear.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有时，我的母亲会把我不再穿的衣服清理出来。

sense_info_list.zh: 明显的; 明白无疑的

examination_example.sentence: It is <highlight>clear</highlight> that Confucius' thought will continue to be a necessary part of Chinese culture.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很明显，孔子思想将继续成为中国文化中不可或缺的一部分。

examination_example.sentence: It is helpful to have a <highlight>clear</highlight> idea (想法) of what you want.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对自己想要的东西有一个明确的想法是很有帮助的。

examination_example.sentence: Active listening is a communication skill in which the listener shows a <highlight>clear</highlight> understanding of what a person is saying.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 积极倾听是一种沟通技巧，在这种技巧中，倾听者对于他人想说的话有着清晰的认知。

sense_info_list.zh: 头脑清醒的; 思路清楚的

examination_example.sentence: It's OK for a nurse to be afraid, as long as she has a <highlight>clear</highlight> head.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对护士来说害怕是正常的，只要她的头脑是清醒的。

sense_info_list.zh: (clear up)解决; 解释; 解答

examination_example.sentence: For Mr. Twain himself, as well as the public, he needs to <highlight>clear</highlight> this matter up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于吐温先生本人以及公众来说，他需要澄清这件事。

word_usage.usage: clear的比较级为clearer，最高级为clearest。但当clear作“完全的，十足的”时，无比较级和最高级。
